item.title: How to do image processing in Android?
item.description: My software is used in this poster Android Canvas This section is the design one function in Android: pick up a photo from gallery and desplay in the App. Tool I used Android Studio to develop my app. It is a mature technology that helps me to build app easily. Add ImageView and Button In the “activity_main.xml” add a Button like this: <Button android:id="@+id/open_picture" style="@style/Base.Widget.AppCompat.Button.Colored" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/open_picture" /> Also add the ImageView:
